idea:
Aaira is a Mumbai based startup & cosmetic brand the sector belongs to nail polish, lipstick & many more in cosmetics products.


TEAM:-Team of 3 people Salman, Afsar & Pankaj all are(Founder and director ) of the company. Our website www.Aairaonline.com  & email aairaonline@gmail.com.


CONCEPT:-The concept is New, very unique & realistic we are using green natural bamboo instead of glass.


TARGET AUDIENCE:-Now a day people are getting a very health-conscious and rich mindset so it a perfect time to introduce the product to the world.


GLOBAL MARKET SIZE:- The worldwide market for Nail Polish is expected to grow at a CAGR of roughly 8.4% over the next five years, will reach 14900 million US$ in 2024, from 9190 million US$ in 2019, according to a new study.


GLOBAL COMPETITOR IN NAIL POLISH BRAND & NOT IN OUR PRODUCT:-
OPI , Maybelline, Dior, CHANEL, ORLY Butter London, Kiko, Nails Inc, Revlon, Sally Hansen, Rimmel, CND, COSMAY, Essie, ZOTOS ACCENT, L’OREAL, ANNA SUI & MANY MORE 


INDIAN MARKET SIZE:- India nail polish market stood at $ 88.6 million in 2018 and is projected to grow at a CAGR of over 10%, to reach $ 143.6 million by 2024 on the back of growing demand for nail polish and nail care products


INDIAN COMPETITOR BRANDS:-

LAKME , REVLON, COLORBAR, ELLE 18, MAYBELLINE & MANY MORE


THE PRODUCT & DESCRIPTION: Aaira Pure Bamboo Nail Polish Bottle, 15ML -Handmade & Leak Proof for Ayurvedic Health Benefits.

> A Strong Leak Proof Cap So Your Nail Polish Stays Inside The Bottle Where It Belongs Aaira Bottles Are Made With Large Threads That Are Easy To Use. Every Aaira Nail polish Bottle Go Through 7 Process Which Ensures A Perfect Nail Polish proof Seal. No Leaks, No Mess.

>A Wide Mouth That Pours Well And Our Colours Give Shine To Your Nails. You Will Love The Feeling Of Odour, Cool Colours Against Your Nails - There'S Nothing Like It!

> A Safe And Durable Material That Doesn'T Hold Smells Emnail Bottles Are Made From Pure Bamboo So Your Nail Polish Stays Fresh And Naturally Clean. Bamboo Is A Relatively Soft But Very Durable Material. Because Bamboo Naturally Keeps Itself Clean, You Don'T Ever Have To Worry About The Safety Of Your Nail Polish Bottle.

> An Attractive Design Hand Made With Pure Bamboo And Printed With Designs That Represent Your Lifestyle, Emnail Bottles Are More Than Just Nail Polish Bottles. They'Re Functional Artwork. They'Re Conversation Starters.


THANK YOU FOR GIVING these GOLDEN OPPORTUNITIES 

TO SHARE OUR IDEA WITH STARTUP INDIA.


Startup firm is one of the greatest firms to make the world a better place , we are also one of them
name: Aaira
